issue.message: The getter return type (`PropertyValuesHolder[]`) and setter parameter type (`PropertyValuesHolder...`) getter and setter methods for property `values` should have exactly the same type to allow be accessed as a property from Kotlin; see https://android.github.io/kotlin-guides/interop.html#property-prefixes

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 4, "evaluator", in androidx.animation.ObjectAnimator.ofMultiInt) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 4, "evaluator", in androidx.animation.ObjectAnimator.ofMultiFloat) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 3, "evaluator", in androidx.animation.ObjectAnimator.ofObject) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 3, "evaluator", in androidx.animation.ObjectAnimator.ofObject) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 4, "evaluator", in androidx.animation.ObjectAnimator.ofObject) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 3, "evaluator", in androidx.animation.PropertyValuesHolder.ofMultiInt) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 3, "evaluator", in androidx.animation.PropertyValuesHolder.ofMultiInt) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 3, "evaluator", in androidx.animation.PropertyValuesHolder.ofMultiFloat) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 3, "evaluator", in androidx.animation.PropertyValuesHolder.ofMultiFloat) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 2, "evaluator", in androidx.animation.PropertyValuesHolder.ofObject) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 2, "evaluator", in androidx.animation.PropertyValuesHolder.ofObject) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 3, "evaluator", in androidx.animation.PropertyValuesHolder.ofObject) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions

Functional interface parameters (such as parameter 1, "evaluator", in androidx.animation.ValueAnimator.ofObject) should be last to improve Kotlin interoperability; see https://kotlinlang.org/docs/reference/java-interop.html#sam-conversions
